title: [Large-Scale] Object-Based Learning Design in Music Education: Practical Approaches for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core music education theory for secondary levels and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teacher training focused on designing and implementing object-based music instruction in authentic classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the cognitive and emotional potential of music education tools (tablets, instruments, etc.) and align them with instructional objectives
Learners can establish assessment plans to enhance students' social skills and creativity through object-based activities
Learners can design and present music education scenarios reflecting cultural diversity and inclusion (EDI)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
